job.title: 8929 -Backend Data engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Need 8 + years of Experience in Java Development  Good Experience with spring boot  Good Experience in Micro Services  Experience with Kafka  Experience with Cassandra, SQL, Spark, Hadoop 3 must have skills : Cassandra, Hadoop, Kafka Why QAIT- A Qualitest company?  At QA InfoTech (a CMMi Level III and ISO certified company), we specialize in providing independent offshore software testing and unbiased software quality assurance services to product companies, ranging from the Fortune 500s to start-up companies.  Have continuous access to and work with Senior Testing Specialists and Practice Experts  Work with cutting edge technology in a company built by testers for testers, this is what we do!  As a global company, we offer unique placement opportunities around the world  Our employees are the reason for our success, we constantly encourage career development and promote from within.  Intrigued to find more about us?  Visit our website at : www.qainfotech.com
